page.title: 14Services
page.content: Electricity and piped water are available to all the houses but most depend on septic tank drainage. People who want to cook with gas have to use bottled gas. The nearest hospital with a casualty department is East Reach Hospital at Taunton. There is no doctor or dentist in the area. In emergencies the fire engine, ambulance or police car would have to come from either Taunton or Bridgwater. The roads are maintained by Somerset County Council. The A361 Taunton to Glastonbury road passes through Burrowbridge. The nearest Motorway is the M5 which can be reached by driving through Moorland and Huntworth. The M5 will take you to Bristol in one direction and Plymouth in the other.
